rowClick

@Output()
rowClick: EventEmitter<Object> = new EventEmitter()
  • Defined in src/table/body/table-row.component.ts:178

Emits when a row is clicked regardless of enableSingleSelect or showSelectionColumn. Should only get emitted when a row item is selected excluding expand buttons, checkboxes, or radios.

selectRow

@Output()
selectRow: EventEmitter<Object> = new EventEmitter()
  • Defined in src/table/body/table-row.component.ts:161

Emits when the row is selected.

selected

@Input()
selected: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/table/body/table-row.component.ts:103

selectionLabelColumn

@Input()
selectionLabelColumn: number
  • Defined in src/table/body/table-row.component.ts:154

Used to populate the row selection checkbox label with a useful value if set.

Example:

<ibm-table [selectionLabelColumn]="0"></ibm-table>
<!-- results in aria-label="Select first column value"
(where "first column value" is the value of the first column in the row -->

showSelectionColumn

@Input()
showSelectionColumn: boolean = true
  • Defined in src/table/body/table-row.component.ts:136

Controls whether to show the selection checkboxes column or not.

showSelectionColumnCheckbox

@Input()
showSelectionColumnCheckbox: boolean = true
  • Defined in src/table/body/table-row.component.ts:142

Shows or hide the checkbox in the selection column when showSelectionColumn is set to true
